summary: During the British Raj, the orphan of a British soldier poses as a Hindu and is torn between his loyalty to a Buddhist mystic and aiding the English secret service.
cast: Errol Flynn|Dean Stockwell|Paul Lukas|Robert Douglas|Thomas Gomez|Cecil Kellaway|Arnold Moss|Reginald Owen|Laurette Luez|Richard Hale|Roman Toporow|Ivan Triesault|Michael Ansara|Bobby Barber|Hamilton Camp|Wallis Clark|Henry Corden|Bette Daniels|Adeline De Walt Reynolds|Richard Glynn|Robin Hughes|Olaf Hytten|George Khoury|Walter Kingsford|Lou Krugman|Frank Lackteen|Edgar Lansbury|Mitchell Lewis|Richard Lupino|Peter Mamakos|Donna Martell|Keith McConnell|Francis McDonald|Lal Chand Mehra|Henry Mirelez|Movita|Jeanette Nolan|Stanley Price|Rodd Redwing|Danny Rees|Lanny Rees|Frank Richards|Hayden Rorke|Mike Tellegen|Wilson Wood
title: Kim de la India
